title: Netflix, Halliburton, CSX, Chipotle: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Stock futures are pointing to losses at the opening bell
body:
Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Wednesday’s opening bell.
Apple  added a paid subscription to its podcast app, along with other new products including an updated high-end iPad. Heard on the Street’s Dan Gallagher writes that the new iPad and iMac might seem a bit late to the game, but there is good reason to think they will still find their mark.
Corrections & Amplifications: Chipotle, Whirlpool and Equifax quarterly earnings are due out after Wednesday’s close. An earlier version of this article incorrectly said they would be out before the open. Verizon and Nasdaq reported before the open, whereas an earlier version said they would report after the close.
